Title: Partner
Investment Thesis: Investing in category-defining companies that leverage AI and data to transform traditional industries. Looking for 10x potential with strong product-market fit.
Bio: 15+ years in venture capital. Previously founded 2 startups (1 exit). Stanford MBA. Passionate about AI-first companies.

Title: Managing Director
Investment Thesis: Backing bold founders building the future of enterprise software. Focus on B2B SaaS with strong unit economics and viral growth.
Bio: Former CTO at Salesforce. 20 years in enterprise software. MIT Computer Science. Board member at 8 companies.

Title: Principal
Investment Thesis: Early-stage investor in consumer and marketplace businesses. Love products that create delightful user experiences and network effects.
Bio: Ex-Product Lead at Airbnb. Harvard Business School. Focus on consumer behavior and growth strategies.

Title: General Partner
Investment Thesis: Investing in transformative technology companies at the earliest stages. Thesis-driven approach focused on platform shifts.
Bio: Serial entrepreneur (3 exits). Angel investor in 50+ startups. Berkeley Engineering. Open source advocate.

Title: Venture Partner
Investment Thesis: Backing mission-driven founders solving hard problems in healthcare and life sciences. Deep tech + social impact.
Bio: MD from Johns Hopkins. Former healthcare exec at Johnson & Johnson. Advisor to WHO on digital health initiatives.

Title: Partner
Investment Thesis: Scaling climate resilience and distributed infrastructure across emerging markets with software-defined hardware.
Bio: Former power systems engineer at GE. Leads the firm's Africa climate practice. Deep network in public-private partnerships.

Title: Principal
Investment Thesis: Future of work and fintech convergence. Seeking founders solving cash-flow pain for SMBs and contractors.
Bio: Started career in product at Stripe. Columbia MBA. Hosts the FinOps Founders circle with 1k members.

Title: Managing Partner
Investment Thesis: Electrification, logistics automation, and new mobility services shaping urban supply chains.
Bio: Ex-COO at a last-mile unicorn. Mechanical engineer by training. Advises USDOT on EV infrastructure policy.

Title: Partner
Investment Thesis: Data platforms modernizing legacy industries: manufacturing, mining, climate resilience.
Bio: Background in mining engineering and analytics. Fluent in French/English. Mentor at FounderFuel.

Title: General Partner
Investment Thesis: Practical automation for warehouses, construction, and field robotics with clear payback windows.
Bio: Ran operations at a global robotics integrator. Holds 12 patents. Lecturer at Carnegie Mellon Robotics.

Title: Partner
Investment Thesis: Digitally native care models, bio-data platforms, and value-based care tooling.
Bio: Former NHS physician turned founder. MSc in Health Policy from LSE. Chairs the FemTech Europe coalition.

Title: Director

Bio: Built the payments stack at MercadoLibre. MBA Insper. Active angel in 15 Brazilian startups.

Title: Venture Partner
Investment Thesis: Decarbonizing freight and maritime operations via software-defined networks and alternative fuels.
Bio: Former VP Sustainability at Maersk. Naval architect. Advises the IMO on green shipping corridors.

Title: Managing Director
Investment Thesis: Next-gen infrastructure: smart cities, mobility-as-a-service, water tech across GCC and South Asia.

Title: Partner

Bio: Ex-Head of Community at Glossier. UCLA Anderson MBA. Hosts the Creator Economy meetup series.

Title: Principal

Bio: Former research scientist at ABB. Speaks five languages. Helped launch the Nordic Deep Tech Alliance.

Title: Partner

Title: Partner

Bio: Former GC at a fintech unicorn. JD from NYU. Runs the annual Legal Ops Summit for startup counsels.

Title: Partner
